name: trembita
description: Request wrapper core for consuming third party services

scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm run xyz:increment major
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm run xyz:increment minor
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm run xyz:increment patch

author: Oleg Koval <oleg@wearereasonablepeople.com> (http://wearereasonablepeople.com/)
